pr_title: Add script fired events and add script inspector devtool

timeline.bodyText: this should probably hold the whole scriptevent
timeline.author: abextm
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,45 @@

+package net.runelite.api.events;
+
+import lombok.Data;
+import net.runelite.api.widgets.Widget;
+
+/**
+ * An event that is fired before the designated script is ran
+ */
+@Data
+public class ScriptPreFired
+{
+	/**
+	 * The script id of the invoked script
+	 */
+	private final int scriptId;
+
+	/**
+	 * The source of the script invoke, this will be null unless
+	 */
+	private Widget source = null;

timeline.message: rl-api: add invoke and return opcodes

timeline.bodyText: Name these in ScriptID so they're not magic numbers.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: imo its better not in scriptid so I don't have to see them when they change, it doesn't matter for this use case.
replies.author: abextm

replies.bodyText: A comment explaining the IDs here would be sufficient then. It's just awkward to leave these as magic numbers.
replies.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.author: Nightfirecat
